data.chText: 海洋的；大海的；与海洋有关的

tr: constituting or living in the open sea
resembling the ocean in apparent limitlessness in extent or degree
example: the oceanic violence of his rage

tr: relating to or occurring or living in or frequenting the open ocean

example.tran: 很多海洋岛屿都是因火山活动而形成的。

value.def: Oceanic means belonging or relating to an ocean or to the sea.
value.tran: 海洋的；大洋的；大海的；与海洋有关的
